modName: Witcher 2 TH3WICK3D1s Blue Stripes Elite with all colors
summary: This adds TH3WICK3D1\'s awesome Blue Stripes Elite Armor plus the three color variants as craftable standalone armors. Now every color is available as a separate piece without having to replace the original textures.
descriptionHtml:
This adds TH3WICK3D1\'s awesome Blue Stripes Elite Armor plus the three color variants each as craftable standalone armors. Now every color is available as a separate piece without having to replace the original textures. This includes all textures and models found in the original. 

The colors included are:
TH3WICK3D1\'s original colors
Black-Blue Recolor by frankenstrat
Black-Red Recolor by hehehe
Redanian Recolor

This compiled from the \"Craftable Blue Stripes Elite Armor v1-1\" version of the mod.

TH3WICK3D1\'s mod can be found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7807
Please endorse his work if you like it.

The uploaded images are also from the original page.
author: McAngus

files.name: Craftable Blue Stripes Elite Armor v1-1-7807-1-1 - All Colors
